response: to protect one's personal information, it is important to be aware of the ways in which our data can be collected and used by various entities. it is essential to read terms and conditions carefully before accepting them. additionally, we should limit sharing personal information online and avoid using unsecured public wi-fi networks. we can also use encryption tools or vpns to protect our data while browsing. we must also report any suspicious activity related to our personal data to the relevant authorities.
